meanings.definition: The quality or state of being somber.
meanings.sent1: The somberness of the room made everyone feel sad.
meanings.sent2: The somberness of the funeral filled the air with sadness.
meanings.sent3: Despite the somberness of the situation, he couldn't help but crack a smile.
meanings.sent4: The somberness of the storm clouds warned of an impending downpour.
meanings.sent5: The somberness of the melody brought tears to her eyes.

meanings.definition: A somber or gloomy atmosphere or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The somberness of the painting evoked a sense of melancholy.
meanings.sent2: The somberness of the sky signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The somberness of the haunted house tour turned out to be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The somberness of the forest at night felt like a shroud of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The somberness of the old building gave it a haunted feel.
